response.overview: Take a trip back through the career of late-night movie host, Fritz The Nite Owl in this exclusive extended documentary featuring behind-the-scenes footage and clips of Nite Owl Theatre throughout the years. This retrospective documentary covers Fritz's years during the original show (1974-1991) and the current version of the show (2010-present) that earned him 6 Emmys and a wide range of fans of all ages.
response.title: Nite Owl Theatre... Then & Now
